General.Name: Xinjiang Tianshan Cement Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinjiangtianshan Cement Co.,Ltd produces and sells cement, clinker, and commercial concrete in China and internationally. It offers Portland cement, ordinary Portland cement, sulphoaluminate cement, oil well cement, hydraulic cement, high-temperature heavy oil cement, sulfate-resistant Portland cement, and ultra-fine Portland cement, as well as Portland cement for nuclear power engineering, marine cement, low-to-medium heat cements, and other special cements, which are used in various construction projects, including industry, agriculture, water conservancy, transportation, civil and municipal, etc. The company also provides pre-stressed and self-stressed reinforced concrete components; and conventional commercial concrete and high-strength concrete for engineering projects, such as ordinary buildings, high-rise buildings, highways, tunnels, viaducts, subways, underground mines, and other engineering projects. It is also involved in the waste heat power generation business. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
